newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Gillette's 1997 estimate cut.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Gillette's 1997 estimate cut.

text.p: -- Prudential Securities analyst Heather Hay said she was trimming the fiscal year 1997 estimates of Gillette Co to $2.60 per share from $2.65 per share.
-- also cut fiscal year 1998 estimate to $3.15 per share from $3.20 per share.
-- said maintained Gillette's buy rating and raised the target price to $95 from $81.
-- Gillette posted on Friday fourth-quarter operating earnings of $0.72 per share compared to $0.64 per share. Hay said the company's comments on its 1997 earnings led to the change in estimates.

-- "Some dislocations in Duracell shipments due to retail inventory adjustments...as well as the acquisition disruption will likely result in slower 1997 first-half results relative to the second half," Hay said.
-- Gillette shares were off 5/8 to 80-7/8 in morning trading on the New York Stock Exchange.
